Later, the same author (Leder 1886 ) recorded this species from Lenkoran.
Roubal ( 1913 )
cited the species from Karachay-Cherkessia, Teberda River.
Nikitskiy & al. ( 2008 )
recorded it from Khosta and Guzeripl', the Caucasian Biosphere Reserve.
